column5: Let's hope this second attempt is better than the first!  Thanks to everyone for the PM'S and help. I'm going to try it this way and see how it works out!  http://web.me.com/handlebarzmuskylures
Now for some bass baits eh.   Good luck Mike.
Good job Mike!!  I like the caption @ the bottom  G
Good stuff, Mike. I just connected your banner to your site. You seem to have a few patterns that scoring more than others....you should call those "Powerbarz".
Good job Mike I like the website now it's time for the orders to start rolling in.  Art
Nice job Mike.Let the orders start rolling in. Good luck.
the 3 new patterns look like killer baits !!! think i'l order 1 of each and use them in the spring on my very first muskie hunt
Hey Mike  Where did the name "Confusion" come from?

Thanks a lot Roy its working great. I like the Powerbarz I had some thoughts along that line for the different sizes 8's would be Sissybarz (smaller but still kick musky butt) 10's dragbarz (they pull the drag like a mother) but I could not get much more thought full to come up with powerbarz or I might have gone there LOL. I guess 10's would make great powerbarz and 13's could be the true dragbarz great for pulling the drag trolling them.  Thanks for the orders guys Paul I will have the parts after the new year for the 2011 baits.  Brian I can make bass sized inline if ya like what colors are your fancy? Brian the wife was looking at the bait the first time I made it and said that looks confusing to me what is it called??? I replied Confusion now I guess??? so she was named from then on.  Thanks Terry Gerritt Art and Radar
Sure looks good, keep us updated Richard
Great job with the site Mike I love the way you have it layed out Those baits of yours look awesome  I like the Double 8 Midnight Mojo Good luck to you! Leechman

Thanks Richard and Jaques. The site was the first one I have done but they do make it easy with the templates it just took some time to find them and then add all my stuff to it.  I hope to have some more parts and pieces by the new year for the double 10's so I will keep you up to date for sure
